name: Leaping Time Dialation
description:
This is a game that was made for the Brackeys 2020.2 Game Jam.  In this game you have a rewind on your vertical position. When you use your rewind it only uses the last few seconds. Use shift to activate the rewind. Move with 'A' and 'D', jump with 'SPACE'.

This is my first attempt at an actual game instead of a half baked prototype.
